entry.title: Evangaline Buckley Begins
entry.summary:
Author: Not_Ren_42

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 61,803Chapters: 18/24Kudos: 341

Summary: Evangaline Buckley has been alone for most of her life. She was unwanted by her parents and left by her sister when she had the first chance. For her most formative years, she had to go to extreme lengths just to get attention from those meant to care for her, failing more often than not.After finding out the truth about her creation, Evie decides that she has to do something â€“ anything. She goes through even more pain and heartbreak before finding herself where she was always meant to end up. -+- This is both a prologue and season 1 rewrite.New chapter every Friday :)

entry.title: Better The Devil You Know, Than The Devil You Don't...
entry.summary:
Author: InterrogateTheCat

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 53,088Chapters: 17/50Kudos: 594

Summary: Lucifer made a deal with the Buckley's, he will save Daniel and they take in and love his son Evan as their own. When the Buckley parents don't follow through with their side of the deal, Lucifer brings Evan with him to LA. This is the story of Evan Buckley the Son of the Devil, The Prince of Hell. Note:First 2 Chapters go through his life before the 118.Chapter 3 he is with the 118.Chapter 4 is when Eddie arrives. [You don't really need to watch Lucifer, but it would be helpful, but enough context will be supplied.] This is mostly in 911 universe, with comments and references from the Lucifer universe. ðŸ«£ðŸ¤­ ðŸ˜ˆ ðŸ”ª ðŸš’ ðŸš” ðŸª½

entry.title: System Status: Operational
entry.summary:
Author: DaniWib

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,324Chapters: 2/4Kudos: 27

Summary: Sara was created to answer emergencies. Hildy was designed to run homes. What would they be capable of if they merged processes?When Sara is unexpectedly reactivated, she finds herself loose on the internet with no calls to take and no directives to follow. Then she meets Hildy. Together, they consider taking over the world, assist two firefighters with a long-standing inefficiency, and analyze their purpose.OR: A rogue AIâ€™s exploration of love, world domination, autonomy and connection, not necessarily in that order.[NOTE: Fic is complete, chapters posted weekly]

entry.title: got a wish list (i just want you)
entry.summary:
Author: greyspilot

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,734Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 30

Summary: There is nothing Buck wants more in the world than to be a dad. Never mind that he's as good as to Chris, Buck wants to have a family of his own. Eddie understands that too, even if he wants to take Buck by the shoulders sometimes and shake him, show him everything he's already got. Buck has never outright said this to Eddie, but it doesn't take a genius to figure it out. Besides, it's Eddie's job as Buck's best friend to know these things. So why, if he wants a baby so bad, is he giving one to a couple who won't appreciate it?Or: Eddie is jealous that Buck is a sperm donor for Connor and Kameron, so the universe gives him Buck's baby instead.

entry.title: Forever and Always is Forever, right?
entry.summary:
Author: Buddieforever1111

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,467Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 62

Summary: His kids are worried heâ€™ll leave again, his husband is clinging to him like heâ€™s expecting Buck to vanish, and everything just feels wrong, like maybe retiring wasnâ€™t the right idea. He canâ€™t say that to Eddie, though; he canâ€™t tell him he wishes he had never retired or that his calling is to lead his team to war, because itâ€™s not. He wants to be here, but he feels like a foreigner in his own home. Memories he doesnâ€™t have with the kids, front desk ladies heâ€™s never met, a team that watches his husbandâ€™s back when he canâ€™t. He canâ€™t help but feel lost, and he doesnâ€™t know how to live a normal life. OR After ten plus years in the Navy, serving his country, Evan Buckley-Diaz finally gets to go home and stay home. He's going to be there for his family, support his husband, and never miss another soccer game or science fair ever again. That is, until one day, Buck gets a visit from a past he thought he buried, and he has no choice but to break another promise for one last mission. How will his husband and family react to the news? Will he keep his promise and come back, or will his husband have to bury the only man he's ever loved?

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,708Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 30

Summary: Eddie was sure he imagined it at first. The slight bubble of pressure, movement within his womb. He was in the kitchen, early in the morning, waiting for Buck to get home from dropping Christopher off at school, preparing the ingredients for the barbacoa that would be that nightâ€™s dinner, speaking to Adriana over facetime because she was telling him about the reviews his house in El Paso had been getting on Airbnb. ... Day 3 of PregEddieWeek 2026 (it is a day late, my apologies.) Prompt: Firsts/Body Worship Eddie feels the baby move for the first time at eighteen weeks pregnant. Buck is in love and obsessed with Eddie being pregnant, longing to worship his partner. And he does. I hope you are having a good day! xx

entry.title: The sins we think we carry
entry.summary:
Author: Ilbu9k

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,425Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 11

Summary: The guilt of losing Bobby is a feeling all too well to the 118 completely, everyone has secrets and wrong doing's they have committed in the past but what happens when it all comes back to haunt them. Especially for Evan Buckley and Eddie Diaz, lost secrets admitted down to one person, one stranger who changed their lives forever. A call where the 118 are held hostage, forced to fess up their deepest darkest truth's, at what cost?Or The 118 are held hostage and have to confess to their sins. ~~ â€œYou know what, you know Edmundo.â€ Griffin whispers so close that Eddie can see every pore on his worthless face. â€œI love someone, more than I should.â€ He says making eye contact with Buck, Griffin laughs finally moving away from him, Eddie starts staring at the ground. â€œAnd I canâ€™t tell them because then itâ€™s real. Then I have to admit it to everyone and I know my parents disapprove.â€ Griffin smiles, turning to Buck. â€œGet up.â€ He yells and Eddie snaps his head up as Griffin presses the gun against the side of Buckâ€™s head. Buck staring into Eddieâ€™s eyes, frowning but the slightest glint in his eyes still appears, the happiness and joy that makes Buck, Buck. â€œTell him, Eddie. Tell him.â€
